entry.tran: 调查者;(尤指)从事调查的人，侦察员
entry.def: An investigator is someone who carries out investigations, especially as part of their job.

means.word_mean: 1. a scientist who devotes himself to doing research
3. a police officer who investigates crimes

Sentence.sentence: Modern airplanes have two black boxes: a voice recorder, which tracks pilots' conversations,and a flight-data recorder, which monitors fuel levels, engine noises and other operating functions that help investigators reconstruct the aircraft's final moments.
The German authorities are sending investigators to discover the cause of the plane crash late yesterday on the island of Tenerife.

sentences.en: The team consisted of six investigators and two secretaries.
